short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The principal enhancement suite for Tildes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tildes ReExtended is a WebExtension that adds various quality of life features to Tildes.net.

* Group & user mention autocompletion
* Dedicated "Back To Top" button
* A "Jump To New Comments" button to more easily read new comments
* Assign user labels to usernames
* Hide other people's and your own votes.
* And more
